import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Register.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=_ref=>{let{setToken,setRole}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:'',role:'customer',contactDetails:{whatsapp:'',location:'',areasOfOperation:[]}});const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;if(name==='whatsapp'||name==='location'){setFormData({...formData,contactDetails:{...formData.contactDetails,[name]:value}});}else{setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');const registrationData={name:formData.name,email:formData.email,password:formData.password,role:formData.role,whatsapp:formData.contactDetails.whatsapp,location:formData.contactDetails.location,areasOfOperation:formData.contactDetails.areasOfOperation};try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/register',registrationData);const{token,role}=response.data;localStorage.setItem('token',token);localStorage.setItem('role',role);setToken(token);setRole(role);navigate('/login');}catch(err){console.error('Registration failed:',err);if(err.response){setError(err.response.data.message);}else{setError('Registration failed.
